name: The Swan Prince
description:
SUMMARY

The Swan Prince is a GxB visual novel based on the story of Swan Lake, where you can pursue two different love interests.

SYNOPSIS

When Princess Sigrid finds a flock of cursed swans, she finds herself fighting against their curse placed by the evil sorcerer Rothbart. With the looming pressure to marry, can Siri take the lead, break their curse, and even find love?

CHARACTERS

FEATURES (DEMO)

  • 2 Love interests
  • Various choices that branch into different scenes
  • 4,000 words
  • 4 sprites with multiple expressions
